name: tech-action-working-group
description: new york city tech action working group

scripts.build: bundle exec jekyll build && npm run js
scripts.watch: parallelshell "bundle exec jekyll serve" "npm run watch:js"
scripts.watch:js: parallelshell "onchange 'src/assets/main.js' -- npm run js" "onchange 'dist/index.html' -- npm run js"

author: skiprox
